cab.content: ram Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,* 25th November 1919.(Repeated Constantinople and Kasvin under No. 78233.)(Received 26th.)15871. 26th November. Malleson telegraphing 23rd November states reportreaching Khorassan from. Askabad that Kizil Arvat has been recaptured byVolunteers. Fourteen trains of reinforcements despatched westward from Askabadon 18th November. Can Baku or (blank group) confirm ?
